name: BlockBug!
description:
Info! (v.01)

You are Bug! Well, that a kind of nice bug. You know, green color, you have one big eye and you just wiggle around. Normal life, right?

You are just doing your business and taking care of Lil Bug (clone from You), until a horde of nasties invades your area! You must defend the home.

Features!

-Old school ONE SCREEN-gameplay

-SCORE!

-Smash nasties and neutrallies with your moves and make them collide!

-Longer you play, more FASTER nasties will be!

-Music! (Well, one song)

Did you know?

-This game is made with Godot!

-Made with principles of KISS (Keep It Simple Stupid)
